name: Dead Trip: Hope
description:
The game of the classic zombie apocalypse genre, with our interesting scenario. The story of a soldier Lars and a police officer Jessica, who are clinging to the last hope to end this hell. In this game you will have to go through difficult levels, survive and find all the necessary items to continue the level, you will have great freedom of choice, since it will largely depend on you how easy it will be for you to play. You can decide for yourself whether you want to unlock all kinds of weapons, find resources faster to go ahead, or find yourself new companions. Auto complication of levels will not let you get bored. Good game.

Lots of different weapons.
Auto difficulty levels.
